Class GameOfLifeGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taheris.gameoflife.GameOfLifeGrid

  • public class GameOfLifeGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose:
    Reprsentation of a Game of Life grid
    Description:
    Responsive layout defined relative to the size of the screen
    Version:
    23 Jan 2013
    Author:
    Shaun Taheri
